channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Evolution
channel.desc: When a meteor crashes on Earth, it brings with it single-celled organisms which evolve rapidly. Later, four professionals stumble upon these aliens and must stop their growth to avoid an invasion.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Train to Busan 2: Peninsula
channel.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: Shakti and Mukti Mohan discuss classical dance forms, followed by performances of the same by participants. The audience must choose the victor.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Cvf-1
channel.desc: Bringing the best in television.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Animal
channel.desc: Marvin wakes up after an accident and discovers that he has powerful animal-like abilities. While his new skills gain him much fame, they also put him in embarrassing situations.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Interview
channel.desc: Aaron and Dave, who run a popular late-night show, get a chance to interview Kim Jong-un. The CIA decides to take advantage of the opportunity and devices a plan to assassinate the infamous dictator.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: S.W.A.T.
channel.desc: When a drug lord offers a huge reward to anyone who can get him out of prison, the SWAT team in Los Angeles, USA is tasked with preventing the escape.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Gran Turismo: Based on a True Story
channel.desc: With the help of a mechanic having a tragic past, an avid player of racing video games attempts to become a professional car racer.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Resident Evil
channel.desc: Two associates of an elite commando team fight an army of zombies controlled by an evil desktop computer in a genetic research facility.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Animal
channel.desc: Marvin wakes up after an accident and discovers that he has powerful animal-like abilities. While his new skills gain him much fame, they also put him in embarrassing situations.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
channel.desc: Chris Redfield teams up with Leon S Kennedy, a DSO agent, and Rebecca Chambers, a professor, to track down Glenn Arias, a death merchant, who wants to unleash a deadly virus in New York City.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Shadow in the Cloud
channel.desc: A WWII pilot is assigned a secret mission to travel with confidential documents on a Boeing B-17 Flying Fortress. However, she soon has to deal with an evil presence on board.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Mulan Legend
channel.desc: During the reign of the Northern Wei Dynasty, Hua Mulan enlists a group of convicts and thieves to help save a princess from an enemy general.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Beeba Boys
channel.desc: To assume authority over Vancouver's illegal ammunition and drug trade, a gang leader goes up against an affluent crime lord.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: The hosts shed light on the theme and become teary-eyed at Siddhesh and Sonal's performance. Later, one of the artists wins the Nritya Shakti Scholarship.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Cvf-1
channel.desc: Bringing the best in television.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Universal Soldier 4
channel.desc: After waking up from a coma, John vows to kill the man responsible for the death of his wife and daughter. However, his vengeance leads him to encounter a terrifying army of reanimated supersoldiers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 13 Ghosts
channel.desc: Arthur, a financially ravaged widower with two children, inherits his eccentric, ghost-hunter uncle's glass house. However, the family encounters 12 vengeful entities after they enter it.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Philadelphia
channel.desc: A young Philadelphia lawyer who is infected with AIDS keeps his homosexuality hidden from his employers. When he is suddenly dismissed, he hires a homophobic lawyer for a wrongful dismissal suit.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Superfly
channel.desc: After surviving an attack from a rival, drug kingpin Priest decides to quit after one last job. But the job goes awry and now he has to deal with blackmail, trigger-happy gang members and the police.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Flashbacks of a Fool
channel.desc: A self-absorbed Hollywood star returns home after his best friend's tragic death. his loss forces him to confront his past and deeply reconsider his life's direction.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ultraviolet
channel.desc: A female rebel is infected with a virus that provides her with superhuman abilities. Thereafter, she tries to safeguard a boy in a futuristic world, who carries the virus's antigen.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: New Police Story
channel.desc: A guilt-ridden police officer finds solace in liquor after he loses his squad during a mission. Soon, his new partner convinces him to reopen the case while harbouring a secret agenda of his own.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Other Guys
channel.desc: When two disgraced police officers are given a task to probe a case involving an evil magnate, they must put aside their differences to become like the top detectives they idolise.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Rob-B-Hood
channel.desc: Two thieves kidnap a wealthy family's baby for a crime boss in exchange for money. Upon developing a strong bond with the infant, they try to protect him from the latter.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hansan: Rising Dragon
channel.desc: Korean admiral Yi Sun-sin and his fleet battle against the attack of the Japanese navy and achieve an epic win through a secret weapon.
